description:
The pilot of the http://anidb.net/ch128538 [Gundam Lfrith Ur], dispatched by the anti-Spacian organization http://anidb.net/ch131851 [Dawn of Fold]. She acts on instinct and has no qualms about satisfying her desires with violence. Sophie is interested in the http://anidb.net/ch123016 [Aerial] and in http://anidb.net/ch124444 [Suletta], a "witch" with a different origin from her own.
Source: Official page
name: Sophie Pulone
